ChiMu  Documentation  API Form descriptionTree Index

Interface com.chimu.form.description.MapperBuilder

public interface MapperBuilder

Method Index

configureCompleted()
Creation and configuration have been completed for all Mappers, do any final activities and notifications required for the mapper.
configureMappers()
Configure the created mappers.
createMappers()
Create and add to the Orm all mappers that will be used by this builder.

Methods

createMappers 
 public abstract void createMappers()
Create and add to the Orm all mappers that will be used by this builder. During this stage you can not assume any other mappers exist.

configureMappers 
 public abstract void configureMappers()
Configure the created mappers.

configureCompleted 
 public abstract void configureCompleted()
Creation and configuration have been completed for all Mappers, do any final activities and notifications required for the mapper.
